trans-unit.source: Contains the fields from a parsed resource expression.
trans-unit.target: 包含剖析的資源運算式中的欄位。

trans-unit.source: When a page is parsed, the values contained in a resource expression are parsed and stored in an instance of the ResourceExpressionFields class.
trans-unit.target: 剖析的頁面時，資源運算式中包含的值被剖析，並儲存在 ResourceExpressionFields 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This ResourceExpressionFields object contains two fields, <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個 ResourceExpressionFields 物件包含兩個欄位，<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey%2A>。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: These fields are drawn from the values of a resource expression in either the explicit (`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`) or implicit (`meta:resourcekey="ResourceKey"`) form.
trans-unit.target: 這些欄位取自 < 在任一個明確資源運算式的值 (`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`) 或隱含 (`meta:resourcekey="ResourceKey"`) 表單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey%2A> property identifies the class name of a resource that is mapped to a resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey%2A>屬性會識別對應的資源檔加入至資源的類別名稱。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to reference a resource file named Financial.resx, or a localized version such as Financial.en-GB.resx, the resource expression would appear as `<%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要參考名為 Financial.resx 或例如 Financial.en GB.resx 當地語系化的版本，資源運算式會顯示成`<%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`。

trans-unit.source: After parsing, the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey%2A> property would return "Financial" as its value.
trans-unit.target: 剖析之後,<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey%2A>屬性則會傳回 「 財務 」 做為其值。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey%2A> property identifies the particular key/value pair to be retrieved from the file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey%2A>屬性會識別要從檔案擷取的特定索引鍵/值組。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Financial.resx file contains a key called `Currency`, that value could be specified with the resource expression `<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Financial.resx 檔案包含金鑰，稱為`Currency`，無法指定值與資源運算式`<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`。

trans-unit.source: After parsing, the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey%2A> property would return "Currency" as its value.
trans-unit.target: 剖析之後,<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey%2A>屬性則會傳回 [貨幣] 做為其值。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resource expression is parsed through the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder.ParseExpression%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 透過剖析資源運算式<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder.ParseExpression%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder.ParseExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Sensitive information should not be stored in a resource file.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 機密資訊應該不會儲存在資源檔。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class key for a parsed resource expression.
trans-unit.target: 取得剖析的資源運算式的類別索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the class key for a parsed resource expression.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回運算式所剖析的資源類別索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The class key represents the name of the resource file, and is the value specified before the comma (,) in an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: [Namespace.]ClassKey, ResourceKey $>`.
trans-unit.target: 類別索引鍵代表的資源檔，名稱，而且是在表單的運算式中指定逗號 （，） 之前的值`<%$ Resources: [Namespace.]ClassKey, ResourceKey $>`。

trans-unit.source: A namespace value for the resource class is optional.
trans-unit.target: 資源類別的命名空間值是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: When a namespace is provided, the namespace and the class key are returned in the ClassKey property.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間提供時，會傳回命名空間和類別識別碼 ClassKey 屬性中。

trans-unit.source: The class key cannot contain spaces or double-byte character sets (DBCS).
trans-unit.target: 類別索引鍵不能包含空格或雙位元組字元集 (DBCS)。

trans-unit.source: To reference a resource file named Financial.resx or a localized version such as Financial.en-GB.resx, you would include the resource expression <`%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考名為 Financial.resx 或例如 Financial.en GB.resx 當地語系化的版本，您會加入資源運算式`%$ Resources: Financial, ResourceKey %>`。

trans-unit.source: After parsing, the ClassKey property would return "Financial" as its value.
trans-unit.target: 剖析之後, ClassKey 屬性會傳回 「 財務 」 做為其值。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Sensitive information should not be stored in a resource file.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 機密資訊應該不會儲存在資源檔。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the class key, or <xref:System.String> if the class key has not been set.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含類別索引鍵，或<xref:System.String>如果尚未設定類別索引鍵。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource key for a parsed resource expression.
trans-unit.target: 取得剖析的資源運算式資源索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the resource key for a parsed resource expression.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回剖析的資源運算式資源索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The resource key is the value specified after the comma (,) in an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`.
trans-unit.target: 資源索引鍵是在表單的運算式中指定逗號 （，） 之後的值`<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>`。

trans-unit.source: The ResourceKey property identifies a particular key/value pair within the resource file mapped to the class key.
trans-unit.target: ResourceKey 屬性識別對應至類別索引鍵的資源檔內的特定索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a file named Financial.resx contains a key called `Currency`, that value could be specified with the resource expression `<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果名為 Financial.resx 包含索引鍵呼叫`Currency`，無法指定值與資源運算式`<%$ Resources: Financial, Currency %>`。

trans-unit.source: After parsing, the ResourceKey property would return "Currency" as its value.
trans-unit.target: 剖析之後, ResourceKey 屬性則會傳回 [貨幣] 做為其值。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Sensitive information should not be stored in a resource file.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 機密資訊應該不會儲存在資源檔。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the resource key, or <xref:System.String> if the resource key has not been set.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含資源的索引鍵，或<xref:System.String>如果尚未設定的資源索引鍵。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.String>
